metadata.title: CVE-2025-0239 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: When using Alt-Svc, ALPN did not properly validate certificates when theoriginal server is redirecting to an insecure site. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 134, Firefox ESR < 128.6, Thunderbird < 134, andThunderbird < 128.6.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
